No game history? You can't see your own game history, all those really high scores you clocked up in the past, without going online and creating a Google Play gamer id. This isn't just a winge, I do most of my playing in tube tunnels.

The game is fun as a time consumer. As a plus, it does not drain much out of the battery. The only downside is when I try to pull down the notification bar, the game registers it as a move. As someone who regularly plays up and left, that can be a serious mistake. As of now, I have to close out of t...Full ReviewThe game is fun as a time consumer. As a plus, it does not drain much out of the battery. The only downside is when I try to pull down the notification bar, the game registers it as a move. As someone who regularly plays up and left, that can be a serious mistake. As of now, I have to close out of the app when I get a notification.
Very Disappointed Love the game. But my high score does not get uploaded to play games. And it's annoying cause my high score is 455312. Please fix that ASAP.

Easy, Fast, and Challenging Most importantly, you can play it in one hand.  Closest comparison I can think of that I have is "Fives".  I love Fives, but I like this far more because of how accessible it is, and the move mechanics remind me of Tetris.  Very fun, definitely a keeper.

Annoying touch sensitivity Same basic premise of classical game. But the touch interface in my phone (Moto G) killed the mood. I have to swipe multiple times to make a move. There should be a setting for that, or a better calibration for other devices
